site_name: Former Leisure CentreMcKerrell Road/Hanover Park SE15
description: Retention of alterations to a building carried out during course of construction under planning permission dated 21/03/2003 application no. 02/AP/0799  for construction of part five, part six and part seven storey building to provide 59 self-contained flats and 16 cluster units to provide changes to the internal layout to provide 58 self contained flats and 96 studio flats.
